name: relume
description: A collection of Relume UI components, blocks, and styleguide

files.content:
"use client"; import { Button } from "@relume_io/relume-ui"; import React from "react"; export function Header1() { return (

Discover Your Favorite Meals at Your Fingertips

Experience the convenience of ordering your favorite dishes with just a few taps. Our app brings a world of flavors directly to you, making mealtime effortless and enjoyable.

); }

"use client"; import { Button, Dialog, DialogContent, DialogTrigger, VideoIframe, } from "@relume_io/relume-ui"; import React from "react"; import { FaCirclePlay } from "react-icons/fa6"; export function Header3() { return (

Discover Your New Favorite Meal Today!

Explore our diverse menu featuring mouth-watering burgers and delightful dishes. Your next culinary adventure awaits just a click away!

); }
